OfferFit - https://offerfit.ai - Director of Software Engineering (Web) - Remote (all remote) - Full-time

Join OfferFit (Series B, ~90 folks, 10M ARR) as a Director of Software Engineering and lead the charge in revolutionizing marketing technology with cutting-edge reinforcement learning! This is your chance to architect and scale a highly innovative SaaS platform, working closely with me (CTO) and a dynamic team of engineers. We're working on a hard problem: making setting up complex RL-powered personalization for large B2C enterprises a fully self-serve experience. You will lead and scale a team of frontend and full stack engineers in building a data-intensive application that our users (enterprise marketers and data analysts) love. Proven track record of shipping user facing applications and growing engineering teams a must.
